description: This is a FastAPI router module for handling CRUD operations related to 'Content'. It defines several API endpoints for listing, retrieving, creating, updating, and deleting content items, with role-based access control and dependency injection for the content service.

methods.name: get_content_service
methods.description: Dependency provider for ContentService, returns an instance connected to MongoDB for use in route handlers.

methods.name: list_content
methods.description: Endpoint to list content items with pagination, accessible by users with read roles.

methods.name: get_content
methods.description: Endpoint to fetch a specific content item by ID, accessible by users with read roles.

methods.name: create_content
methods.description: Endpoint to create a new content item, accessible by users with write roles.

methods.name: update_content
methods.description: Endpoint to update an existing content item, accessible by users with write roles.

methods.name: delete_content
methods.description: Endpoint to soft-delete a content item, accessible by admin roles.
